data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of South Eleuthera, Bahamas.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Eleuthera, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of South Eleuthera, Bahamas.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of South Eleuthera.
Lord, make the 1,980 believers in South Eleuthera to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 3,020 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in South Eleuthera, Bahamas.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of South Eleuthera will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in South Eleuthera, Bahamas. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.section_summary:
the state of South Eleuthera, Bahamas has a population of 5,000.

We estimate South Eleuthera has 1,980 people who might know Jesus, 2,743 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 277 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
